message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $2000000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think $2000000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1400000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
